name: Spirits Aid
description:
Controls:

WASD - Move

J - Attack

K - Special Ability (Locked)

L - Special Ability (Locked)

This is a rogue-like game  that revolves around helping an  Alebrije protect the environment of endangered species from Mexico, in this case the Jaguar, Quetzal and Axolotl, as you help them protect their habitat, you'll get their special abilities growing stronger.

Game made by Avocado Jam
